dialogue.text: Last night I dreamed the question and I were dancing. When I woke, I realized we never stopped.

psychological_notes: Dreams reveal complete integrationâ€”even the unconscious now knows the relationship with the question is a dance, not a battle. The recognition that they 'never stopped' dancing shows how resistance itself was part of the choreography. Full psychic unity achieved.
philosophical_underpinning: Existence as continuous dance with mystery
therapeutic_direction: Integration complete across all levels of consciousness
